snippet: JPMorgan Chase, one of the underwriters for the social network's initial public offering, decked out its headquarters at 270 Park Avenue in Manhattan with Facebook paraphernalia in anticipation of a visit from company management.
abstract: JPMorgan Chase, one of the underwriters for the social network's initial public offering, decked out its headquarters at 270 Park Avenue in Manhattan with Facebook paraphernalia in anticipation of a visit from company management.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
